item.title: Special promotions for the Fireworks Celebration at the Mandarin Oriental, Macau
item.description:
The Mandarin Oriental, Macau has special Fireworks Celebration packages perfect for corporate events, team building, or client appreciation. These packages provide a unique opportunity to experience the 26th Macau International Fireworks Display Contest. Source: Mandarin Oriental Macau website. Available on September 8th, 13th, 20th, 27th, and October 1st, 2014, the package starts at MOP4,388 and includes: Overnight accommodations in a room or suite with panoramic fireworks views through expansive windows. A special four-course fireworks-themed dinner for two at the Vida Rica Restaurant, showcasing Chef Dominique Bugnand’s modern take on classic French cuisine...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/special-promotions-for-the-fireworks-celebration-at-the-mandarin-oriental-macau/

item.title: W Retreat & Spa Bali - Seminyak is celebrating its fifth anniversary with a month-long celebration
item.description:
Source: W Retreat & Spa Bali website. The W Retreat & Spa Bali in Seminyak is celebrating its fifth anniversary on March 5, 2016. The resort will commemorate this milestone with a month-long celebration titled “FIVE ON FIVE,” showcasing five unique highlights. WOOBAR will present special edition Paletas Wey popsicles, a Mexican-style frozen treat crafted by the Bali-based company. Meanwhile, W THE STORE will offer an exclusive, limited-edition collection of “Wanitas” décor...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/w-retreat-spa-bali-seminyak-is-celebrating-its-fifth-anniversary-with-a-month-long-celebration/

item.title: Grand Hyatt Mumbai reveals its plans for New Year's Eve
item.description:
The Grand Hyatt Mumbai, a premier Hyatt International property and a central hotel for Mumbai, Pune, and Goa, is hosting multiple New Year’s Eve celebrations. Starting at 7 pm, guests can enjoy the Grand Courtyard Party. This event features dancing under the stars, drinks, and desserts for INR 3,500 plus taxes. At 7 pm, several dining options are available. Soma offers North West Frontier cuisine with vegetarian and non-vegetarian choices. Celini provides Italian cuisine, while China House serves a Chinese-themed dinner...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/grand-hyatt-mumbai-reveals-its-plans-for-new-year-s-eve/

item.title: Capella Singapore introduces exciting promotions for Chinese New Year
item.description:
Capella Singapore is celebrating the Year of the Rooster with special menus at their Cantonese restaurant, Cassia, from January 28th, 2017. They are also offering a three-night retreat package during this festive period. Source: Capella Singapore. Capella Singapore’s Cassia’s Prosperity Lou Hei (百花齐放捞起). Cassia’s Prosperity Lou Hei (百花齐放捞起), a Lunar New Year staple, is back. Executive Chef Lee Hiu Ngai has carefully chosen each ingredient for this dish, which includes a variety of fresh greens, salmon, and a homemade passion fruit sauce for a refreshing twist...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/capella-singapore-introduces-exciting-promotions-for-chinese-new-year/

item.title: Hotel Jen Tanglin and Hotel Jen Orchardgateway will be celebrating their first birthday on March 31st
item.description:
Source: Hotel Jen Orchardgateway website. Hotel Jen, a new brand from the Shangri-La Group, is turning one year old on March 31, 2016. To mark this milestone, the two Singapore locations, Hotel Jen Tanglin and Hotel Jen Orchardgateway, are joining their sister hotels across nine Asian-Pacific cities for a grand birthday celebration. Each location will host unique events reflecting their city’s character, from a Mad Hatter’s tea party in Beijing to street art-inspired menus in Brisbane and a pool party in the Maldives...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/hotel-jen-tanglin-and-hotel-jen-orchardgateway-will-be-celebrating-their-first-birthday-on-march-31st/

item.title: Join us at Clarke Quay for the Once Upon a Nightmare free street party to celebrate Halloween
item.description:
Clarke Quay is hosting “Once Upon A Nightmare,” a street party they’re calling the most frightening Halloween event of the year. The event, which is free to attend, will be hosted by popular radio DJs Justin Ang and Vernon A from 98.7FM’s Muttons On The Move. Source: Clarke Quay. Attendees can enjoy live music from local band Enigma and participate in themed games for a chance to win prizes. Guests are encouraged to dress up in their most twisted and imaginative interpretations of fairytale characters...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/join-us-at-clarke-quay-for-the-once-upon-a-nightmare-free-street-party-to-celebrate-halloween/
